author: gordonsmith
msg: Falcon: Added a functional-tests folder to the Eclipse project with a SDKSWCTests JUnit file which will soon test compiling the Flex SWCs with Falcon.
Functional ActionScript tests like this will help us test Falcon's ActionScript functionality until Adobe donates the ActionScript unit tests.
These tests do not pass yet and are not part of 'ant tests'.

author: jukka
msg: Improved state tracking in node builders, including internal
revision counters to optimize the common case where no changes
